titleStmt.title: The pope translated out of the old Dutch coppye, in print all most 50 yeares since, and novv reprinted, 1621.
titleStmt.author: John, of Capistrano, Saint, 1386-1456.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to St. John of Capistrano by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (University of Cambridge). Library.
